mapper.sql: ID, BUSINESSNOTICENO, RESERVATIONTIME, CUSTOMNAME, PICKUPADDRESS, CUSTOMCODE, LINKMAN, TELPHONE, WEIGHT, VOLUME, IMPORTANTHINTS, ARRIVECITY, PICKERINFO, SENDADDRESS, PROCESSINGUNIT, NOTIFICATIONSOURCE, CUSTOMNOMODIFYFLAG, SINGLETYPE, PACKAGESNUM, ACTUALWEIGHT, BILLINGWEIGHT, PACKINGFEE, ACTUALPACKING
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (select rownum rn,bb.* from acc_businessadmissibility bb
and BUSINESSNOTICENO like concat(concat('%',#{businessnoticeno}),'%')
and CUSTOMCODE like concat(concat('%',#{customcode}),'%')
)

select bb.*,e.empname as empname,un.name as name from acc_businessadmissibility bb inner join sy_units un on bb.ProcessingUnit=un.id inner join sy_emp e on bb.PickerInfo=e.id where bb.BusinessNoticeNo=#{businessnoticeno}
mapper.insert: insert into BOS.ACC_BUSINESSADMISSIBILITY (ID, BUSINESSNOTICENO, RESERVATIONTIME, CUSTOMNAME, PICKUPADDRESS, CUSTOMCODE, LINKMAN, TELPHONE, WEIGHT, VOLUME, IMPORTANTHINTS, ARRIVECITY, PICKERINFO, SENDADDRESS, PROCESSINGUNIT, NOTIFICATIONSOURCE, CUSTOMNOMODIFYFLAG, SINGLETYPE, PACKAGESNUM, ACTUALWEIGHT, BILLINGWEIGHT, PACKINGFEE, ACTUALPACKING ) values (bility_id.nextval, CONCAT('YWH',bility_no.nextval), sysdate, #{customname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickupaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{importanthints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickerinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{notificationsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customnomodifyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{singletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packagesnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billingweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualpacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert into BOS.ACC_BUSINESSADMISSIBILITY
ID,
BUSINESSNOTICENO,
RESERVATIONTIME,
CUSTOMNAME,
PICKUPADDRESS,
CUSTOMCODE,
LINKMAN,
TELPHONE,
WEIGHT,
VOLUME,
IMPORTANTHINTS,
ARRIVECITY,
PICKERINFO,
SENDADDRESS,
PROCESSINGUNIT,
NOTIFICATIONSOURCE,
CUSTOMNOMODIFYFLAG,
SINGLETYPE,
PACKAGESNUM,
ACTUALWEIGHT,
BILLINGWEIGHT,
PACKINGFEE,
ACTUALPACKING,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{businessnoticeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reservationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{customname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pickupaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{importanthints,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{arrivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pickerinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processingunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{notificationsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{customnomodifyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{singletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{packagesnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{actualweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billingweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{packingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{actualpacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update BOS.ACC_BUSINESSADMISSIBILITY
BUSINESSNOTICENO = #{businessnoticeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVATIONTIME = #{reservationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUSTOMNAME = #{customname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICKUPADDRESS = #{pickupaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMCODE = #{customcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VOLUME = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IMPORTANTHINTS = #{importanthints,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARRIVECITY = #{arrivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICKERINFO = #{pickerinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SENDADDRESS = #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSINGUNIT = #{processingunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOTIFICATIONSOURCE = #{notificationsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUSTOMNOMODIFYFLAG = #{customnomodifyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SINGLETYPE = #{singletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGESNUM = #{packagesnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUALWEIGHT = #{actualweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILLINGWEIGHT = #{billingweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PACKINGFEE = #{packingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUALPACKING = #{actualpacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.ACC_BUSINESSADMISSIBILITY set BUSINESSNOTICENO = #{businessnoticeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVATIONTIME = #{reservationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUSTOMNAME = #{customname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICKUPADDRESS = #{pickupaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMCODE = #{customcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VOLUME = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IMPORTANTHINTS = #{importanthints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVECITY = #{arrivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICKERINFO = #{pickerinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SENDADDRESS = #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSINGUNIT = #{processingunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTIFICATIONSOURCE = #{notificationsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUSTOMNOMODIFYFLAG = #{customnomodifyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SINGLETYPE = #{singletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGESNUM = #{packagesnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUALWEIGHT = #{actualweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILLINGWEIGHT = #{billingweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PACKINGFEE = #{packingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUALPACKING = #{actualpacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
